attributes.action: Government to make it Law that all New  build Houses have Solar Panels Fitted.
attributes.additional_details: As the General Public are Struggling with Bills it would help the ones in New Builds, this in my opinion should have been done years ago, the cost is not that much for the gains.
attributes.background: All New Houses to be Built with Solar Panels Fitted, this would help with Energy Bills, Also Common Sense, this would help the National Energy Crisis.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/617573
